Text:
Can anyone give me a comment,To let me know i did it wright.I see people downloading it,And i know i am seeding it,But it says 0 seeders,I am tempted to go to my neibors and download then seed,Because i am sure the seeders number is not showing the proper numbers.
ProudFather

I went to my friends and got him to download to,And he is seeding,So i guess the numbers on here are not right.
Now i know i uploaded the torrent properly,I hope the other parents kid`s like this show and enjoy it as much as my little girl does,If there is a demand for this i will upload the rest of the 4 square movie`s i am purchasing this week.

I will continue to seed for a couple weeks,Just so you know it has seeders even though it says it does not,Usaly i keep away from any torrents that say 0 seeders,But i have now learned the numbers are wrong,Atleast on the few sites i uploaded this torrent to,Thanks for taking the time to read my post`s.
ProudFather
Hi ProudFather. My twin boys love this show. Do you have any other 4 Square dvd's? Thanks for the upload, will keep seeding.

halfaclue my little girl loves this show to,So i do plan on getting her all the 4 square movies,I will be getting more,As soon as the wife chooses what one i should get next,So in about a week i should have more,And i will be posting them all here as i buy them.
The funny thing is i have burnes so many cartoons and Disney stuff,But all she wants to watch is 4 square,And she will watch it over and over,If she had it her way..lol

awesome, i'll be sure to keep watching for the uploads then. it's funny how kids love this show so much. i think the simplicity of the colors and everything appeal to really young children. thanks again, and i'll keep the seeding going as these are super hard to find online.

I am also amazed at how much the young ones like this show,My little girl has a selection of hundreds of movies,And she always picks 4 square
